alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 01 at 10:22AM CDT until April 06 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is likely. * WHERE...Yellow River at Necedah. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to late Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage is expected based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM CDT.
